hero.title: ADVANCED FACIAL SEARCH TECHNOLOGY
hero.subtitle: Uncover identities securely with Face Seek's AI-powered facial recognition platform. Trusted by investigators, journalists, and security professionals worldwide for ethical OSINT research.

card1.title: LIGHTNING-FAST FACIAL SEARCH
card1.desc: Our reverse image face search technology scans millions of indexed images in milliseconds. Advanced AI face lookup algorithms deliver instant results across global data clusters.

card2.title: PRIVACY-FOCUSED FACIAL SEARCH
card2.desc: Industry-leading 256-bit encryption protects every facial recognition search. Your image data is never permanently stored, ensuring complete privacy in facial intelligence operations.

card3.title: MULTI-ENGINE OSINT FACE SEARCH
card3.desc: Simultaneous queries across Google, Bing, Yandex, and specialized OSINT databases. Our facial search engine aggregates results from the world's largest public web indexes.

card4.title: PRECISION BIOMETRIC MATCHING
card4.desc: State-of-the-art facial recognition algorithms achieve 98.7% accuracy. Our image intelligence platform uses 128-point facial mapping for unmatched precision in face recognition search.

card5.title: ETHICAL AI FACIAL RECOGNITION
card5.desc: Full GDPR and KVKK compliance for responsible facial intelligence. Our platform adheres to international standards for ethical AI and open-source intelligence protocols.

card6.title: COMPREHENSIVE OSINT DATA INTEGRATION
card6.desc: Facial search results from social media, news sites, and public records. Our OSINT facial recognition platform consolidates open-source intelligence.

footer.description: Advanced Facial Search Technology. Professional OSINT and facial recognition tools for digital investigations.

howItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.subtitle: Professional face search in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.description: Upload a face image. Our engine automatically detects and extracts face features.

step2.title: AI Processing
step2.description: Our algorithms build a biometric signature and search billions of indexed images.

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Receive comprehensive intelligence reports with confidence scores and source URLs.

step1.title: UPLOAD IMAGE
step1.desc: Upload your target image to our secure engine. We accept all standard formats and optimize resolution for accuracy.

step2.title: AI FACE MAPPING
step2.desc: Advanced biometric algorithms extract 128 unique face landmarks to build a mathematical signature for search.

step3.title: MULTI-SOURCE INDEXING
step3.desc: Your query is processed across Google, Bing, Yandex and OSINT databases in real time.

step4.title: RESULTS & ANALYTICS
step4.desc: Get confidence scores, source URLs, and contextual metadata for professional validation.

cta.description: Join thousands of professionals using FaceSeek for ethical facial intelligence. Get 3 free searches to start.

pricingPreview.title: AFFORDABLE
pricingPreview.subtitle: Flexible pricing to fit your needs

q1.question: How does FaceSeek work?
q1.answer: FaceSeek analyzes faces in uploaded photos using AI and searches across Google, Bing, Yandex and other engines for matching images. Results are presented with similarity scores.

q2.question: Is my data secure?
q2.answer: Yes. Uploaded images are deleted after processing. No biometric data is stored. We are GDPR and KVKK compliant with 256-bit encryption.

q3.question: Can I use it for free?
q3.answer: Yes! You get 3 free searches when you sign up. You can also earn additional credits by inviting friends.

q4.question: What file formats are supported?
q4.answer: We support JPG, PNG, WebP, and HEIC formats. Maximum file size is 10MB. The system automatically optimizes resolution for accuracy.

q5.question: Is API integration available?
q5.answer: Yes. Our Enterprise plan includes RESTful API access. You can add face search capabilities to your own applications.
